name: Cervus Blade
description:
Cervus Blade is an enchanting third-person action adventure game that takes players on an epic journey through a deer-worship desert world. Engage in high-octane combat, testing your skills in challenging encounters, unleash the power of the Blade and become a legend in this captivating adventure.




DEER HUNT
Step into the shoes of a Hunter on a mission to rid the land of corruption and filth left behind by the ancient god Cervus in this action-packed adventure.

BLADE UNLEASHED
Prepare for a thrilling and challenging combat system that encompasses defense, dodging, summoning and more. Engage in epic battles, showcasing your skills and mastery as you navigate through an adrenaline-fueled world.

SANDS OF REVELATION
Explore a breathtaking yet perilous desert world, where a cult devoted to deer holds secrets. Unveil the truth behind their rituals as you embark on an immersive journey of discovery.




Cervus Blade is an MFA thesis project at the University of Southern California by Tianyue Gu, developed with help of Team Blade. For more information, please visit our publisher page. To learn more about the USC Games program, the #1 Games Program in the world, check out the USC Games website, linked to the right.
